mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into cs_agents (customer_id, process_user_id, process_user_name, terminals_quantity, status, address, reason, created_at, updated_at, apply_num, reciver, phone, terminals_list) values (#{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalsQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reciver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalsList,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update cs_agents set customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process_user_id = #{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process_user_name = #{processUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, terminals_quantity = #{terminalsQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, apply_num = #{applyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reciver = #{reciver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, terminals_list = #{terminalsList,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, customer_id, process_user_id, process_user_name, terminals_quantity, status, address, reason, created_at, updated_at, apply_num, reciver, phone, terminals_list from cs_agents where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
